lead_paragraph: The term suggests the president belongs in the same league as Mao Zedong and Deng Xiaoping, and reinforces his power to shape the party’s new leadership.

headline.print_headline: Party Leaders in China Elevate the President’s Status
headline.main: China’s Communist Party Declares Xi Jinping ‘Core’ Leader

snippet: The term suggests the president belongs in the same league as Mao Zedong and Deng Xiaoping, and reinforces his power to shape the party’s new leadership....
abstract: China's Communist Party designates Pres Xi Jinping core leader, rank held by predecessors Mao Zedong and Deng Xiaoping; some fear elevated status will compromise ideal of collective leadership and revive excesses of previous strongmen, while others say current global challenges require strong leadership.
